name: No More Bugs
description:
You just made a simple platforming game, but it's full of BUGS and you have no idea how to fix them. Luckily you know someone who is the best at bug-fixing:

Your Grandma

________________

Please note, that the browser version does not work properly. Will be fixed.

A short game, made for 2020 Wowie Game Jam 2.0.

Time to make:
Took a little more than 30 hours.
